error.message: Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().
Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().
Call to deprecated constant NODE_NOT_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::NOT_PUBLISHED instead.
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete_recursive(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::deleteRecursive().
Call to deprecated constant NODE_NOT_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::NOT_PUBLISHED instead.
Call to deprecated function file_uri_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\StreamWrapper\StreamWrapperManagerInterface::getScheme() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_uri_target(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\StreamWrapper\StreamWrapperManagerInterface::getTarget() instead.

Call to deprecated function drupal_get_messages(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::all() or \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::messagesByType() instead.
Call to deprecated constant NODE_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::PUBLISHED instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ezproxy_stanza.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
